questions.question_text: "...ati _____ _____ karīne satsang kare to tene koī jātno doṣh haiyāmā rahe nahī ane deh chhatā ja brahmarūp thaī jāy."
questions.explanation: This is a direct quote from Vachanamrut Sārangpur 9.

questions.question_text: Bhagwāne kahyu chhe je, “Jevo hu satsange karīne vash thāuchhu evo tap, yagna, yog, vrat, dānādik sādhane karīne paṇ vash nathī thāto.”
questions.explanation: This quote is found in Swamini Vato 1/17.

questions.question_text: "jyāre āvo _____ prāpt thayo tyāre deh mūkīne jene pāmavā hatā te to deh chhatā ja maḷyā chhe; māṭe jene parampad kahīe, mokṣh kahīe tene chhate dehe ja pāmyo chhe."
questions.explanation: This is a direct quote from Vachanamrut Gadhada Antya 2.

questions.question_text: Jan pratye jīvan kahe, jene jeṭalo satsang; Tene teṭalā pāpno, thāy bāher bhītar bhang.
questions.explanation: This quote is from Bhaktachintamani, verse 84.

questions.question_text: Te satsang shu je, ‘Moṭā _____ hāth joḍavā ne te kahe tem karavu e ja chhe.’
questions.explanation: This is a direct quote from Swamini Vato 1/17.
